description: This table contains basic information from procedure abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the associated patient (EPT) record.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the procedure abstraction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Associated


Populated


In Progress


Edited


Validated


Needs Review


Ready for Export


Exported


Restored


Signed


Ready to Sign


Ready to Submit


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Done


Submit


Historical


Modified


Inactivated


Void


Saved to EQRS


Dialysis Intra-Facility Transfer


Investigating


Closed


Abstracting


Completed


Ready for Nurse Review


Ready for Physician Review


Waiting for Signoff


Care Planning Complete


Will Not Be Exported


Accepted with Warnings


A0410 Correction Requested


Wrong FAC_ID


Test Record


Corrected/Inactivated/Deleted


Abandoned


Admission Complete


Doc Complete


Filed

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the user who set the current status.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the current status (RDI-10024) was set.

columns.name: NHSN_VERSION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the NHSN version to use for the abstraction. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


IDM 7.1


IDM 8.1


IDM 8.3/8.4


IDM 8.5


IDM 8.6/8.7


IDM 8.8-9.0


IDM 9.2


IDM 9.4


IDM 9.5


IDM 10.1


IDM 11.1

columns.name: NHSN_PROC_DT
columns.description: The date of the procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_PROC_DURATION_HOURS
columns.description: The hour piece of the duration of the procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_PROC_DURATION_MINS
columns.description: The minute piece of the duration of the procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_CPT_CODE
columns.description: The CPT code associated with procedure abstraction.

columns.name: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether general anesthesia was used for this operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NHSN_TRAUMA_CASE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this operative procedure was performed because of blunt or penetrating traumatic injury to the patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_SCOPE_USED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this entire operative procedure was performed using a laparoscope/robotic assist.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_DIABETES_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has a diagnosis of diabetes requiring management with insulin or a non-insulin anti-diabetic agent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_HEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's most recent height documented in the medical record in inches (in) prior to this operative procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_WEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's most recent weight documented in the medical record in ounces (oz) prior to this operative procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_OUTPAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the operative procedure was performed on an NHSN Outpatient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_WOUND_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The wound classification category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Clean


Clean-contaminated


Contaminated


Dirty

columns.name: NHSN_ASA_SCORE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ASA classification category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


ASA 1


ASA 2


ASA 3


ASA 4


ASA 5

columns.name: NHSN_EMERG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the operative procedure was a non-elective, unscheduled operative procedure.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_CLOSURE_TECH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The closure technique category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Other than Primary

columns.name: NHSN_SPINAL_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The spinal fusion level category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Atlas-axis


Atlas-axis / Cervical


Cervical


Cervical / Dorsal / Dorsolumbar


Dorsal / Dorsolumbar


Lumbar / Lumbosacral

columns.name: NHSN_SPINAL_TECH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The spinal fusion technique category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Anterior


Posterior


Both Anterior and Posterior


Transoral

columns.name: NHSN_PROST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The prosthesis type category ID for the operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Total: Total Primary


Total: Total Revision


Total: Partial Revision


Hemi: Partial Primary


Hemi: Total Revision


Hemi: Partial Revision


Resurfacing: Total Primary


Resurfacing: Total Revision


Resurfacing: Partial Primary


Resurfacing: Partial Revision

columns.name: NHSN_SURGEON_CODE
columns.description: The code of the surgeon who performed the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the surgical log (ORL .1) associated with the procedure abstraction.

columns.name: NHSN_LABOR_DURATION
columns.description: The number of hours the patient was in labor in the hospital.

columns.name: NHSN_PROC_CODE_ID
columns.description: The NHSN procedure code associated with procedure abstraction.

columns.name: NHSN_JOINT_INFECTION_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the prosthesis is associated with an infection at the index joint.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_GEN_ANESTH_YN

columns.name: NHSN_OR_LOG_PANEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The panel number from the OR log used to create an NHSN procedure abstraction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Panel 1


Panel 2


Panel 3


Panel 4


Panel 5

columns.name: NHSN_ICD_PROC_ID
columns.description: The ICD code associated with a procedure abstraction.

columns.name: NHSN_ICD_PROC_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: HOW_CREATED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the method used to create the procedure abstraction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Imported


NHSN LabID-Quick Create


NHSN LabID-Abstract


NHSN LabID-Abstract All


NHSN Procedure-Quick Create


NHSN Procedure-Abstract


NHSN Procedure-Manual


NHSN Procedure-Surgical Print Group


Procedure-Batch Job


NHSN SSI-Create SSI


SSI-Create SSI (From Surveillance Abstraction)


NHSN VAE-Batch Job


Event-Create Case


Event-Manual


NHSN AR-Abstract All


NHSN AR-Abstract


NHSN CLIP - Manual


NHSN CLIP - Created from LDA


NHSN CLIP - Quick Create


NHSN CLIP - Abstract


Surveillance Abstraction - Batch Job


Case Reporting - Manual


Case Reporting - Automated - Diagnosis


Case Reporting - Automated - Reason for Visit


Case Reporting - Automated - Lab Result


Case Reporting - Automated - Hospital Census


NHSN PedVAE - Criteria Print Group


NHSN PedVAE-Batch Job

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location (hospital) associated with the procedure.

columns.name: NHSN_ADMISSION_DT
columns.description: The date the patient was admitted for the purpose of submission to the CDC.
